story:
[EN] Hello, my name is Grzegorz and I am an architect. I come from Poland, but I currently live in Romania where I am an active proponent of straw bale building. Together with my wife Maria, and our many enthusiastic friends we are trying to spread the word about straw bale construction.

_______________________________

[FR] Bonjour, je m’appelle Grzegorz  et je suis architecte. Je suis Polonais, mais j’habite actuellement en Roumanie ou je soutiens activement la construction en ballots de paille. Avec mon épouse, Maria, et nos amis enthousiastes, nous essaions de promouvoir la construction en paille. 

_______________________________

[DE] Hallo, mein Name ist Grzegorz und ich bin Architekt. Ich komme aus Polen, aber zurzeit lebe ich in Rumänien, wo ich zusammen mit meiner Frau Maria und vielen begeisterten Freunden versuche den Strohballenbau bekannt zu machen.

_______________________________

[RO] Salut, numele meu este Grzegorz și sunt architect. Sunt născut în Polonia, însă de doi ani m-am stabilit în România, unde, împreună cu soția mea și cu prietenii noștri entuziaști, promovez arhitectura ecologică și construcțiile din baloți de paie.


https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.591909657494960.1073741833.363250173694244&type=1&l=ece9934fa4

[EN] Over the past three years, I attended workshops, construction fairs and straw bale builders’ gatherings. 

_______________________________

[FR] Au cours des trois dernières années, j’ai participé à des ateliers, des foires de construction et des réunions des constructeurs en ballots de paille.

_______________________________

[DE] In den letzten drei Jahren nahm ich an Workshops, Baumessen und Treffen der Strohballenbauer teil. 

_______________________________

[RO] În ultimii trei ani am participat la workshopuri, târguri de construcții ecologice și conferințe ale constructorilor de case din baloți de paie.


https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.579866948699231.1073741830.363250173694244&type=3

[EN] I have also collected and read a lot of books about natural building and I worked as a site manager for one of the first straw bale houses in Romania.

_______________________________

[FR] J’ai aussi rassemblé et lu un grand nombre de livres sur la construction naturelle et j’ai travaillé comme superviseur de chantier pour une des premières maisons en paille réalisées en Roumanie.

_______________________________

[DE] Ich habe auch viele Bücher über Naturbau gelesen und ich war Baustellenleiter für eines der ersten Strohballenhäuser in Rumänien.

_______________________________

[RO] În același timp, am adunat și am citit multe cărți despre construcțiile din materiale naturale și am lucrat ca șef de șantier la una dintre primele case din baloți de paie din România. 


https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.573776059308320.1073741828.363250173694244&type=1&l=279c74c498

[EN] Last year we started a project called Earth Safe Design, aimed at building straw bale houses in Romania and raising awareness about straw bale building and natural building in general.

_______________________________

[FR] L’année dernière nous avons commencé un projet appelé « Earth Safe Design », qui a comme but la construction des maisons en paille en Roumanie et la promotion de cette méthode de construction ainsi que de la construction naturelle en général.

_______________________________

[DE] Voriges Jahr haben wir ein Projekt mit dem Namen “Earth Safe Design” angefangen, dessen Ziel es ist, Strohballenhäuser in Rumänien aufzubauen und das Bewusstsein über Strohballenbau und Naturbau im Allgemeinen zu schärfen. 

_______________________________

[RO] Anul trecut am pus bazele Earth Safe Design, un proiect care are ca scop construcția și promovarea caselor din baloți de paie în România. (Dacă vreți să aflați mai multe despre avantajele acestor case, găsiți informații aici: http://www.earthsafedesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Flyer-ESD-1.pdf) 

[EN] Romania has a long history of building with straw and earth. 

_______________________________

[FR] La Roumanie a une longue histoire de construction en paille et en terre.

_______________________________

[DE]  Rumänien hat eine lange Geschichte des Strohballen- und Lehmbaus. 

_______________________________

[RO] În România, paiele și pământul sunt un material de construcție tradițional, cu o istorie lungă. 

[EN] Unfortunately, over the past two decades, the traditional techniques and materials have been gradually abandoned in favour of concrete blocks insulated with polystyrene and finished with cement plasters and toxic paints, resulting in arguably aesthetic houses.

_______________________________

[FR] Malheureusement, pendant les deux dernières décennies, les techniques et matériaux traditionnels ont graduellement été abandonnés pour le béton isolé avec polystyrène et finalisé avec du cément et des peintures toxiques, avec des résultats peu esthétiques.

_______________________________

[DE] Leider hat man in den  letzten zwei Jahrzehnten allmählich auf die traditionellen Methoden und Baustoffe verzichtet, zugunsten der mit Polystyren isolierten und mit Zementputz und gifthaltigen Anstrichstoff ausgebauten Betonblöcke. Unästhetische Häuser sind das Ergebnis dieser Entwicklung. 

_______________________________

[RO] Din păcate, în ultimii douăzeci de ani, materialele și tehnicile tradiționale au fost abandonate în favoarea blocurilor din BCA, izolate cu polistiren și finisate cu vopsele toxice, totul rezultând în case cu o estetică discutabilă. 

[EN] There are many negative stereotypes attached to earth and straw houses. People tend to see natural buildings as not very durable and they link them to poor living conditions. With our campaign, we are trying to show that straw and earth can be used in different ways, building solid houses with many unexpected advantages.

Last year we have managed to set up a stall at a small construction fair in Bucharest. This involved making and printing leaflets, banners and building a straw bale panel on site. 

_______________________________

[FR] Beaucoup de stéréotypes négatifs sont associés aux maisons en paille et en terre. Les gens pensent que les bâtiments naturels ne sont pas très durables et les associent au fait de vivre dans des conditions pauvres. Notre campagne essaie de montrer que la paille et la terre peuvent être utilisées des différentes manières pour construire des maisons solides avec beaucoup d’avantages inattendus.

L’année dernière nous avons eu l’opportunité de monter un stand dans une foire de construction à Bucarest. Nous avons réalisé et imprimé des flyers, des affiches et avons construit un panel en paille sur place, ce qui nous a également donné l’occasion de vérifier combiens de ballots de paille rentrent dans nos petites voitures. 

_______________________________

[DE] Es gibt viele negative Stereotpye über Lehm- und Strohballenhäuser. Naturbauten gelten häufig als nicht dauerhaft und werden mit schlechten Wohnverhältnissen assoziiert. Mit unserer Kampagne versuchen wir zu zeigen, dass Strohballen und Lehm in verschiedenen Weisen benutzt werden können, um feste Häuser mit vielen überraschenden Vorteilen aufzubauen.

Voriges Jahr ist es uns gelungen, einen Ausstellungstand bei einer kleinen Buchmesse in Bukarest einzurichten. In diesem Zusammenhang, haben wir Broschüren und Werbebanner erstellt und gedruckt und eine Strohballenwand vor Ort aufgebaut. 

_______________________________

[RO] Există multe stereotipuri negative în legătură cu casele din pământ și paie. Ele sunt considerate mai puțin durabile și de multe ori lumea le asociază cu condiții de viață modeste. Campania noastră încearcă să demonstreze că paiele și pământul pot fi folosite în modrui diferite, construind case solide, cu avantaje surprinzătoare.

Anul trecut, am reușit să organizăm un stand la târgul Expo Casa Mea din București, unde am construit un modul de perete din baloți de paie și am împărțit materiale informative. 

https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.59190...

[EN] It also gave us the chance to check how many straw bales we can fit in our small cars.

_______________________________

[DE] Das hat uns auch die Gelegenheit gegeben zu erfahren, wieviele Strohballen in unsere kleinen Autos passen. 

_______________________________

[RO] Cu ocazia asta, am putut testa și câți baloți de paie pot intra în mașinile noastre. 



[EN] Our demonstration generated a lot of interest and a few journals even wrote about our project: http://www.earthsafedesign.com/publicatii/ 

Next, we took our straw bales and our wall to a lively art and culture street festival in the heart of Bucharest. It was great to see so much interest and so many people excited to discover straw bale building.

_______________________________

[FR] Notre démonstration a généré beaucoup d’internet et plusieurs journaux ont écrit sur notre projet: http://www.earthsafedesign.com/publicatii/

Ensuite, nous avons pris nos ballots de paille et notre mur à un festival culturel d’art de rue au cœur de Bucarest. C’était génial de voir autant d’intérêt et autant de gens enthousiasmés à la découverte de la construction en ballots de paille. 

_______________________________

[DE] Unsere Vorführung hat viel Interesse erweckt und einige Zeitungen und Zeitschriften haben über unser Projekt berichtet: http://www.earthsafedesign.com/publicatii

Danach haben wir unsere Strohballen und unsere Strohballenwand im Rahmen eines lebendigen Kunst- und Kulturfestivals im Zentrum von Bukarest ausgestellt. Es war toll, so viel Interesse zu erleben und so viele Leute zu treffen, die begeistert waren, den Strohballenbau zu entdecken.

_______________________________

[RO] Demonstrația noastră a stârnit mult interes și câteva publicații chiar au scris despre noi: http://www.earthsafedesign.com/publicatii/

Apoi, ne-am dus baloții de paie și peretele în centrul Bucureștiului, la Street Delivery. A fost grozav să vedem atâția oameni interesați și entuziasmați să descopere construcțiile din baloți de paie. 




https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.606929689326290.1073741836.363250173694244&type=1&l=fb60d61bfa

[EN] After this event, we were honoured to receive an invitation to the Bucharest Architecture Annual, where we changed our work clothes for something a little bit more presentable and gave a talk about straw bale building. 

_______________________________

[FR] Suite à cet évènement, nous avons eu l’honneur d’être invités au Annuel d’Architecture de Bucarest, où nous avons changé nos habits de travail pour quelque chose de plus présentable et avons fait une présentation sur la construction en ballots de paille. 

_______________________________

[DE] Nach diesem Festival, waren wir geehrt, eine Einladung zum jährlichen Architekturkongress in Bukarest zu bekommen, wo wir auf unsere Arbeitskleidung verzichtet haben und etwas salonfähiger angezogen einen Vortrag über Strohballenbau gehalten haben.

_______________________________

[RO] În urma participării la Expo Casa Mea, am fost onorați să primim o invitație la Anuala de Arhitectură, unde am schimbat hainele de lucru cu o ținută mai prezentabilă și am vorbit, încă o data, despre construcțiile din baloți de paie. 


https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.607506342601958.1073741837.363250173694244&type=1&l=e98fc36588

[EN] As the location where the Architecture Annual was held was near the site of the festival, our straw bale wall had the chance for an unplanned nocturnal parade down Bucharest’s main avenue.

_______________________________

[FR] Comme le site de l’Annuel d’Architecture était proche du festival, notre mur en ballots de paille a fait l’objet d’une parade nocturne inattendue sur le boulevard principal de Bucarest. 

_______________________________

[DE] Da der Kongress in der Nähe des Festivalstandorts stattfand, hatte unsere Strohballenwand die unerwartete Gelegenheit, nachts auf die Hauptstraße in Bukarest transportiert zu werden.

_______________________________

[RO] Pentru că Anuala de Arhitectură a avut loc în apropiere de strada unde fusese festivalul, peretele nostru din baloți de paie a avut ocazia unei parade nocturne pe Bulevardul Magheru. 


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_3xgTuiL0oA

[EN] Finally, just before the cold season started, we travelled all the way to Cluj, where we made another presentation at Transylvania Fair.

_______________________________

[FR]  Enfin, juste avant la saison froide, nous avons voyagé à Cluj, où nous avons fait une autre présentation à la Foire de Transylvanie.

_______________________________

[DE] Schließlich sind wir zum Herbstende nach Cluj/Kolozsvár/Klausenburg gefahren, wo wir eine andere Vorführung im Rahmen der “Transylvania Fair” gemacht haben.

_______________________________

[RO] În sfârșit, înainte de începerea sezonului rece, am dat o fugă până la Cluj, unde am făcut o nouă prezentare pentru Transylvania Fest.





[EN] Following these actions, there were a few other articles in the press about straw bale building and our website saw an increase in popularity.

Encouraged by the success of our campaign so far, we have set ourselves a new goal. This time, we would not be able to do it on our own, so we are asking for your support. In April 2014 we want to attend Construct Expo, the largest construction fair in Bucharest. This event gathers 17000 visitors over a period of three days and gets coverage all over the mass media. 

_______________________________

[FR] Suite à ces actions, la construction en ballots de paille a été couverte dans plusieurs articles de presse et notre site a augmenté en popularité, avec une moyenne de 30 visiteurs uniques dans la journée.

Encouragés par le succès de notre campagne jusqu’ici, nous nous sommes fixé un nouvel objectif. Cependant, cette fois-ci nous avons besoin de votre soutien pour le réaliser. En avril 2014, nous voulons participer à Expo Construct, le plus grand salon de construction de Bucarest. Cet évènement rassemble 17000 visiteurs sur une période de 3 jours et reçoit une large couverture médiatique. 

_______________________________

[DE] In Anlehnung an diesen Aktionen gab es viele Presseartikel über den Strohballenbau. Zudem erlebe unsere Webseite einen nicht gekannten Ansturm mit durschnittlich 30 verschiedenen Besuchern pro Tag.

Vom Erfolg unserer Kampagne bis hierher ermutigt, haben wir uns ein neues Ziel gesetzt. Diesmal sind wir aber auf Ihre Unterstützung angewiesen: Wir wollen an Expo Construct teilnehmen, der größten Baumesse in Bukarest, die im April 2014 stattfinden wird.17 000 Besucher sind für gewöhnlich bei dieser Veranstaltung zugegen, die drei Tage dauert. Es wird in allen Massenmedien darüber berichtet. 

_______________________________

[RO] În urma acestor acțiuni de promovare au apărut mai multe articole în presă despre casele din baloți de paie iar numărul de vizitatori de pe site-ul nostru a crescut. 

Încurajați de succesul de până acum al campaniei, ne-am fixat un nou obiectiv. De data aceasta, nu ne putem descurca pe cont propriu, de aceea vă cerem ajutorul. În aprilie 2014 vrem să participăm la Construct Expo, cel mai mare târg de tehnologii și materiale pentru construcții din București. Evenimentul se bucură de multă atenție în mass media și va găzdui 17000 de vizitatori, într-o perioadă de 3 zile.  

[EN] Inspired by Barbara Jones's presentation at EcoBuild, we want to build a small straw bale house and give people a chance to experience the qualities of a straw bale structure. We also want to print more leaflets and informative banners. 

_______________________________

[FR] Inspiré par la présentation de Barbara Jones à Ecobuild, nous souhaitons construire une petite maison en ballots de paille et donner l’occasion aux gens de tester directement les qualités d’une structure en paille. Nous voudrions également imprimer des brochures et affiches informatives. 

_______________________________

[DE]  Wir wollen ein kleines Strohballenhaus aufbauen und den Leuten die Gelegenheit geben, die Charakteristika einer Strohballenstruktur wahrzunehmen. Wir wollen auch mehr Broschüren und Werbebanner drucken.

_______________________________

[RO] Inspirați de prezentarea Barbarei Jones de la Ecobuild (Londra) vrem să construim o căsuță din baloți de paie, pentru a le da oamenilor ocazia să observe direct calităție unei astfel de structuri. De asemenea, plănuim să tipărim o serie nouă de fluturași și bannere informative. 


[EN] We are sure that this event would be a big step on the way to establishing straw bale building as an acknowledged building technique, one that will be embraced by more and more Romanians in the years to come.

Unfortunately, we cannot afford the fee for taking part in this fair, nor the other expenses involved in printing and buying building materials. Below you will find a detailed list of our expenses.

We are addressing our appeal to straw bale builders, straw bale house owner, and straw bale enthusiast who know and understand the benefits and the delight of living in a natural house. 

_______________________________

[FR] Cet évènement serait un grand pas en avant pour établir la construction en paille en tante que technique de construction reconnue, technique qui serra adoptée par un nombre croissant de Roumains dans le futur.

Malheureusement nous n’avons pas les fonds nécessaires pour couvrir les frais de participation à ce salon, ni les autres coûts d’imprimerie et d’achat de matériaux. Vous pouvez trouver le détail de ces frais plus bas. 

Ainsi, nous nous adressons à vous, constructeurs en ballots de paille, propriétaires de maison en paille ou simplement enthousiastes des ballots de paille, qui connaissez et appréciez les bénéfices et la joie de vivre dans une maison naturelle. 

_______________________________

[DE] Wir sind sicher, dass diese Veranstaltung ein großer Schritt wäre auf dem Weg der Etablierung des Strohballenbaus als anerkannte Bautechnik, die von immer mehr Rumänen in den nächsten Jahren angewandt werden könnte.

Leider können wir uns aber weder die Teilnahmegebühr, noch die weiteren Kosten (z.B. für Drucke, Baustoffe etc.) leisten. Unten finden Sie eine detaillierte Liste der Kosten.

Wir sprechen Strohballenbauer, Besitzer von Strohballenhäusern und Strohballenbauliebhaber, die die Vorteile und die Wonne des Lebens in einem Naturbau kennen und verstehen. Helfen Sie uns, das Wissen und die Freude zu verbreiten!

_______________________________

[RO] Suntem singuri că acest eveniment va fi un pas important în direcția impunerii materialelor naturale precum baloții de paie și tencuiala din pământ printre materiale de construcții recunoscute și apreciate în România.

Din păcate, noi nu putem acoperi pe cont propriu costurile participării la Expo Construct. Mai jos veți găsi o listă detaliată cu cheltuielile necesare pentru acest eveniment.

Adresăm acest apel atât constructorilor și proprietarilor de case din baloți de paie din alte țări, unde această tehnică este deja populară, cât și susținătorilor arhitecturii ecologice din România, celor care cred în beneficiile materialelor naturale de construcții și celor care apreciază estetica aparte a caselor din baloți de paie cu tencuieli naturale. 

             

[EN] Help us spread the knowledge and the joy! 


[FR] Aidez nous à diffuser cette connaissance et cette joie ! 


[DE] Helfen Sie uns, das Wissen und die Freude zu verbreiten!  


                                      

Thank you!

Merci Beaucoup!

Danke schön!

Mulțumim! 



[EN] Our expenses:

Participation fee for Construct Expo: 150 €

Renting space for our stall: 15 m² X 50 € = 750 €

Project approval fee = 150 €

Building materials (straw bales, wood, clay, nails) + transport + helpers = 450 €

Banners =  50 € 

Leaflets = 200 €

Business cards = 50 €

Online advertising = 200 € 

Indiegogo Campaign fee = 150 €

Total  2150 €

_______________________________

[FR] Nos dépenses:

Frais de participation à Expo Construct : 150 €

Location de l’espace pour notre stand: 15 m² X 50 € = 750 €

Frais d’approbation du projet = 150 €

Matériaux de construction (ballots de paille, bois, argile, clous ) + transport + main d’oeuvre = 450 €

Bannière =  50 € 

Brochures = 200 €

Cartes de visite = 50 €

Promotion en ligne = 200 €

Frais de campagne Indiegogo = 150 €

Total 2150 €

_______________________________

[DE] Kostenaufwand:

Teilnahmegebühr: 150 €

Standmiete: 15m² X 50€ = 750 €

Projektgenehmigunggebühr: 150 €

Baustoffe (Strohballen, Holz, Lehm und Ton, Nägel) + Transport + Hilfsarbeiter = 450 €

Banner = 50 €

Broschüren = 200 €

Geschäftskarten = 50 €

Online-Werbung = 200 €

Indiegogo Kampagne Gebühr = 150 €

Toatal 2150 €

_______________________________

[RO] Cheltuieli

Taxa participare Construct Expo: 150 € Închiriere spațiu stand: 150 €

Taxa aprobare proiect stand: 15 m2 X 50 € = 750 €

Materiale de construcție (baloți de paie, lemn, lut, cuie) + transport + ajutoare = 450 € 

Bannere = 50 €

Fluturași = 200 €

Cărți de vizită = 50 €

Publicitate online = 200 €

Taxa de campanie Indiegogo = 150 € 

Total 2150 € 


Link to the Construct Expo website http://www.constructexpo.ro/despre
Earth Safe Design http://www.earthsafedesign.com/
Find us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/earthsafedesign
story_txt:
[EN] Hello, my name is Grzegorz and I am an architect. I come from Poland, but I currently live in Romania where I am an active proponent of straw bale building. Together with my wife Maria, and our many enthusiastic friends we are trying to spread the word about straw bale construction._______________________________[FR] Bonjour, je m’appelle Grzegorz  et je suis architecte. Je suis Polonais, mais j’habite actuellement en Roumanie ou je soutiens activement la construction en ballots de paille. Avec mon épouse, Maria, et nos amis enthousiastes, nous essaions de promouvoir la construction en paille. _______________________________[DE] Hallo, mein Name ist Grzegorz und ich bin Architekt. Ich komme aus Polen, aber zurzeit lebe ich in Rumänien, wo ich zusammen mit meiner Frau Maria und vielen begeisterten Freunden versuche den Strohballenbau bekannt zu machen._______________________________[RO] Salut, numele meu este Grzegorz și sunt architect. Sunt născut în Polonia, însă de doi ani m-am stabilit în România, unde, împreună cu soția mea și cu prietenii noștri entuziaști, promovez arhitectura ecologică și construcțiile din baloți de paie.https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.591909657494960.1073741833.363250173694244&type=1&l=ece9934fa4[EN] Over the past three years, I attended workshops, construction fairs and straw bale builders’ gatherings. _______________________________[FR] Au cours des trois dernières années, j’ai participé à des ateliers, des foires de construction et des réunions des constructeurs en ballots de paille._______________________________[DE] In den letzten drei Jahren nahm ich an Workshops, Baumessen und Treffen der Strohballenbauer teil. _______________________________[RO] În ultimii trei ani am participat la workshopuri, târguri de construcții ecologice și conferințe ale constructorilor de case din baloți de paie.https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.579866948699231.1073741830.363250173694244&type=3[EN] I have also collected and read a lot of books about natural building and I worked as a site manager for one of the first straw bale houses in Romania._______________________________[FR] J’ai aussi rassemblé et lu un grand nombre de livres sur la construction naturelle et j’ai travaillé comme superviseur de chantier pour une des premières maisons en paille réalisées en Roumanie._______________________________[DE] Ich habe auch viele Bücher über Naturbau gelesen und ich war Baustellenleiter für eines der ersten Strohballenhäuser in Rumänien._______________________________[RO] În același timp, am adunat și am citit multe cărți despre construcțiile din materiale naturale și am lucrat ca șef de șantier la una dintre primele case din baloți de paie din România. 



https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.573776059308320.1073741828.363250173694244&type=1&l=279c74c498[EN] Last year we started a project called Earth Safe Design, aimed at building straw bale houses in Romania and raising awareness about straw bale building and natural building in general._______________________________[FR] L’année dernière nous avons commencé un projet appelé « Earth Safe Design », qui a comme but la construction des maisons en paille en Roumanie et la promotion de cette méthode de construction ainsi que de la construction naturelle en général._______________________________[DE] Voriges Jahr haben wir ein Projekt mit dem Namen “Earth Safe Design” angefangen, dessen Ziel es ist, Strohballenhäuser in Rumänien aufzubauen und das Bewusstsein über Strohballenbau und Naturbau im Allgemeinen zu schärfen. _______________________________[RO] Anul trecut am pus bazele Earth Safe Design, un proiect care are ca scop construcția și promovarea caselor din baloți de paie în România. (Dacă vreți să aflați mai multe despre avantajele acestor case, găsiți informații aici: http://www.earthsafedesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Flyer-ESD-1.pdf) 





[EN] Romania has a long history of building with straw and earth. _______________________________[FR] La Roumanie a une longue histoire de construction en paille et en terre._______________________________[DE]  Rumänien hat eine lange Geschichte des Strohballen- und Lehmbaus. _______________________________[RO] În România, paiele și pământul sunt un material de construcție tradițional, cu o istorie lungă. 





[EN] Unfortunately, over the past two decades, the traditional techniques and materials have been gradually abandoned in favour of concrete blocks insulated with polystyrene and finished with cement plasters and toxic paints, resulting in arguably aesthetic houses._______________________________[FR] Malheureusement, pendant les deux dernières décennies, les techniques et matériaux traditionnels ont graduellement été abandonnés pour le béton isolé avec polystyrène et finalisé avec du cément et des peintures toxiques, avec des résultats peu esthétiques._______________________________[DE] Leider hat man in den  letzten zwei Jahrzehnten allmählich auf die traditionellen Methoden und Baustoffe verzichtet, zugunsten der mit Polystyren isolierten und mit Zementputz und gifthaltigen Anstrichstoff ausgebauten Betonblöcke. Unästhetische Häuser sind das Ergebnis dieser Entwicklung. _______________________________[RO] Din păcate, în ultimii douăzeci de ani, materialele și tehnicile tradiționale au fost abandonate în favoarea blocurilor din BCA, izolate cu polistiren și finisate cu vopsele toxice, totul rezultând în case cu o estetică discutabilă. 






[EN] There are many negative stereotypes attached to earth and straw houses. People tend to see natural buildings as not very durable and they link them to poor living conditions. With our campaign, we are trying to show that straw and earth can be used in different ways, building solid houses with many unexpected advantages.Last year we have managed to set up a stall at a small construction fair in Bucharest. This involved making and printing leaflets, banners and building a straw bale panel on site. _______________________________[FR] Beaucoup de stéréotypes négatifs sont associés aux maisons en paille et en terre. Les gens pensent que les bâtiments naturels ne sont pas très durables et les associent au fait de vivre dans des conditions pauvres. Notre campagne essaie de montrer que la paille et la terre peuvent être utilisées des différentes manières pour construire des maisons solides avec beaucoup d’avantages inattendus.L’année dernière nous avons eu l’opportunité de monter un stand dans une foire de construction à Bucarest. Nous avons réalisé et imprimé des flyers, des affiches et avons construit un panel en paille sur place, ce qui nous a également donné l’occasion de vérifier combiens de ballots de paille rentrent dans nos petites voitures. _______________________________[DE] Es gibt viele negative Stereotpye über Lehm- und Strohballenhäuser. Naturbauten gelten häufig als nicht dauerhaft und werden mit schlechten Wohnverhältnissen assoziiert. Mit unserer Kampagne versuchen wir zu zeigen, dass Strohballen und Lehm in verschiedenen Weisen benutzt werden können, um feste Häuser mit vielen überraschenden Vorteilen aufzubauen.Voriges Jahr ist es uns gelungen, einen Ausstellungstand bei einer kleinen Buchmesse in Bukarest einzurichten. In diesem Zusammenhang, haben wir Broschüren und Werbebanner erstellt und gedruckt und eine Strohballenwand vor Ort aufgebaut. _______________________________[RO] Există multe stereotipuri negative în legătură cu casele din pământ și paie. Ele sunt considerate mai puțin durabile și de multe ori lumea le asociază cu condiții de viață modeste. Campania noastră încearcă să demonstreze că paiele și pământul pot fi folosite în modrui diferite, construind case solide, cu avantaje surprinzătoare.Anul trecut, am reușit să organizăm un stand la târgul Expo Casa Mea din București, unde am construit un modul de perete din baloți de paie și am împărțit materiale informative. 






https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.59190...[EN] It also gave us the chance to check how many straw bales we can fit in our small cars._______________________________[DE] Das hat uns auch die Gelegenheit gegeben zu erfahren, wieviele Strohballen in unsere kleinen Autos passen. _______________________________[RO] Cu ocazia asta, am putut testa și câți baloți de paie pot intra în mașinile noastre. 






[EN] Our demonstration generated a lot of interest and a few journals even wrote about our project: http://www.earthsafedesign.com/publicatii/ Next, we took our straw bales and our wall to a lively art and culture street festival in the heart of Bucharest. It was great to see so much interest and so many people excited to discover straw bale building._______________________________[FR] Notre démonstration a généré beaucoup d’internet et plusieurs journaux ont écrit sur notre projet: http://www.earthsafedesign.com/publicatii/Ensuite, nous avons pris nos ballots de paille et notre mur à un festival culturel d’art de rue au cœur de Bucarest. C’était génial de voir autant d’intérêt et autant de gens enthousiasmés à la découverte de la construction en ballots de paille. _______________________________[DE] Unsere Vorführung hat viel Interesse erweckt und einige Zeitungen und Zeitschriften haben über unser Projekt berichtet: http://www.earthsafedesign.com/publicatiiDanach haben wir unsere Strohballen und unsere Strohballenwand im Rahmen eines lebendigen Kunst- und Kulturfestivals im Zentrum von Bukarest ausgestellt. Es war toll, so viel Interesse zu erleben und so viele Leute zu treffen, die begeistert waren, den Strohballenbau zu entdecken._______________________________[RO] Demonstrația noastră a stârnit mult interes și câteva publicații chiar au scris despre noi: http://www.earthsafedesign.com/publicatii/Apoi, ne-am dus baloții de paie și peretele în centrul Bucureștiului, la Street Delivery. A fost grozav să vedem atâția oameni interesați și entuziasmați să descopere construcțiile din baloți de paie. 






https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.606929689326290.1073741836.363250173694244&type=1&l=fb60d61bfa[EN] After this event, we were honoured to receive an invitation to the Bucharest Architecture Annual, where we changed our work clothes for something a little bit more presentable and gave a talk about straw bale building. _______________________________[FR] Suite à cet évènement, nous avons eu l’honneur d’être invités au Annuel d’Architecture de Bucarest, où nous avons changé nos habits de travail pour quelque chose de plus présentable et avons fait une présentation sur la construction en ballots de paille. _______________________________[DE] Nach diesem Festival, waren wir geehrt, eine Einladung zum jährlichen Architekturkongress in Bukarest zu bekommen, wo wir auf unsere Arbeitskleidung verzichtet haben und etwas salonfähiger angezogen einen Vortrag über Strohballenbau gehalten haben._______________________________[RO] În urma participării la Expo Casa Mea, am fost onorați să primim o invitație la Anuala de Arhitectură, unde am schimbat hainele de lucru cu o ținută mai prezentabilă și am vorbit, încă o data, despre construcțiile din baloți de paie.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_3xgTuiL0oA[EN] Finally, just before the cold season started, we travelled all the way to Cluj, where we made another presentation at Transylvania Fair._______________________________[FR]  Enfin, juste avant la saison froide, nous avons voyagé à Cluj, où nous avons fait une autre présentation à la Foire de Transylvanie._______________________________[DE] Schließlich sind wir zum Herbstende nach Cluj/Kolozsvár/Klausenburg gefahren, wo wir eine andere Vorführung im Rahmen der “Transylvania Fair” gemacht haben._______________________________[RO] În sfârșit, înainte de începerea sezonului rece, am dat o fugă până la Cluj, unde am făcut o nouă prezentare pentru Transylvania Fest.[EN] Following these actions, there were a few other articles in the press about straw bale building and our website saw an increase in popularity.Encouraged by the success of our campaign so far, we have set ourselves a new goal. This time, we would not be able to do it on our own, so we are asking for your support. In April 2014 we want to attend Construct Expo, the largest construction fair in Bucharest. This event gathers 17000 visitors over a period of three days and gets coverage all over the mass media. _______________________________[FR] Suite à ces actions, la construction en ballots de paille a été couverte dans plusieurs articles de presse et notre site a augmenté en popularité, avec une moyenne de 30 visiteurs uniques dans la journée.Encouragés par le succès de notre campagne jusqu’ici, nous nous sommes fixé un nouvel objectif. Cependant, cette fois-ci nous avons besoin de votre soutien pour le réaliser. En avril 2014, nous voulons participer à Expo Construct, le plus grand salon de construction de Bucarest. Cet évènement rassemble 17000 visiteurs sur une période de 3 jours et reçoit une large couverture médiatique. _______________________________[DE] In Anlehnung an diesen Aktionen gab es viele Presseartikel über den Strohballenbau. Zudem erlebe unsere Webseite einen nicht gekannten Ansturm mit durschnittlich 30 verschiedenen Besuchern pro Tag.Vom Erfolg unserer Kampagne bis hierher ermutigt, haben wir uns ein neues Ziel gesetzt. Diesmal sind wir aber auf Ihre Unterstützung angewiesen: Wir wollen an Expo Construct teilnehmen, der größten Baumesse in Bukarest, die im April 2014 stattfinden wird.17 000 Besucher sind für gewöhnlich bei dieser Veranstaltung zugegen, die drei Tage dauert. Es wird in allen Massenmedien darüber berichtet. _______________________________[RO] În urma acestor acțiuni de promovare au apărut mai multe articole în presă despre casele din baloți de paie iar numărul de vizitatori de pe site-ul nostru a crescut. Încurajați de succesul de până acum al campaniei, ne-am fixat un nou obiectiv. De data aceasta, nu ne putem descurca pe cont propriu, de aceea vă cerem ajutorul. În aprilie 2014 vrem să participăm la Construct Expo, cel mai mare târg de tehnologii și materiale pentru construcții din București. Evenimentul se bucură de multă atenție în mass media și va găzdui 17000 de vizitatori, într-o perioadă de 3 zile.  






[EN] Inspired by Barbara Jones's presentation at EcoBuild, we want to build a small straw bale house and give people a chance to experience the qualities of a straw bale structure. We also want to print more leaflets and informative banners. _______________________________[FR] Inspiré par la présentation de Barbara Jones à Ecobuild, nous souhaitons construire une petite maison en ballots de paille et donner l’occasion aux gens de tester directement les qualités d’une structure en paille. Nous voudrions également imprimer des brochures et affiches informatives. _______________________________[DE]  Wir wollen ein kleines Strohballenhaus aufbauen und den Leuten die Gelegenheit geben, die Charakteristika einer Strohballenstruktur wahrzunehmen. Wir wollen auch mehr Broschüren und Werbebanner drucken._______________________________[RO] Inspirați de prezentarea Barbarei Jones de la Ecobuild (Londra) vrem să construim o căsuță din baloți de paie, pentru a le da oamenilor ocazia să observe direct calităție unei astfel de structuri. De asemenea, plănuim să tipărim o serie nouă de fluturași și bannere informative. 




[EN] We are sure that this event would be a big step on the way to establishing straw bale building as an acknowledged building technique, one that will be embraced by more and more Romanians in the years to come.Unfortunately, we cannot afford the fee for taking part in this fair, nor the other expenses involved in printing and buying building materials. Below you will find a detailed list of our expenses.We are addressing our appeal to straw bale builders, straw bale house owner, and straw bale enthusiast who know and understand the benefits and the delight of living in a natural house. _______________________________[FR] Cet évènement serait un grand pas en avant pour établir la construction en paille en tante que technique de construction reconnue, technique qui serra adoptée par un nombre croissant de Roumains dans le futur.Malheureusement nous n’avons pas les fonds nécessaires pour couvrir les frais de participation à ce salon, ni les autres coûts d’imprimerie et d’achat de matériaux. Vous pouvez trouver le détail de ces frais plus bas. Ainsi, nous nous adressons à vous, constructeurs en ballots de paille, propriétaires de maison en paille ou simplement enthousiastes des ballots de paille, qui connaissez et appréciez les bénéfices et la joie de vivre dans une maison naturelle. _______________________________[DE] Wir sind sicher, dass diese Veranstaltung ein großer Schritt wäre auf dem Weg der Etablierung des Strohballenbaus als anerkannte Bautechnik, die von immer mehr Rumänen in den nächsten Jahren angewandt werden könnte.Leider können wir uns aber weder die Teilnahmegebühr, noch die weiteren Kosten (z.B. für Drucke, Baustoffe etc.) leisten. Unten finden Sie eine detaillierte Liste der Kosten.Wir sprechen Strohballenbauer, Besitzer von Strohballenhäusern und Strohballenbauliebhaber, die die Vorteile und die Wonne des Lebens in einem Naturbau kennen und verstehen. Helfen Sie uns, das Wissen und die Freude zu verbreiten!_______________________________[RO] Suntem singuri că acest eveniment va fi un pas important în direcția impunerii materialelor naturale precum baloții de paie și tencuiala din pământ printre materiale de construcții recunoscute și apreciate în România.Din păcate, noi nu putem acoperi pe cont propriu costurile participării la Expo Construct. Mai jos veți găsi o listă detaliată cu cheltuielile necesare pentru acest eveniment.Adresăm acest apel atât constructorilor și proprietarilor de case din baloți de paie din alte țări, unde această tehnică este deja populară, cât și susținătorilor arhitecturii ecologice din România, celor care cred în beneficiile materialelor naturale de construcții și celor care apreciază estetica aparte a caselor din baloți de paie cu tencuieli naturale. 




             [EN] Help us spread the knowledge and the joy! 
[FR] Aidez nous à diffuser cette connaissance et cette joie ! 
[DE] Helfen Sie uns, das Wissen und die Freude zu verbreiten!                                        Thank you!Merci Beaucoup!Danke schön!




Mulțumim! 






[EN] Our expenses:Participation fee for Construct Expo: 150 €Renting space for our stall: 15 m² X 50 € = 750 €Project approval fee = 150 €Building materials (straw bales, wood, clay, nails) + transport + helpers = 450 €Banners =  50 € Leaflets = 200 €Business cards = 50 €Online advertising = 200 € Indiegogo Campaign fee = 150 €Total  2150 €_______________________________[FR] Nos dépenses:Frais de participation à Expo Construct : 150 €Location de l’espace pour notre stand: 15 m² X 50 € = 750 €Frais d’approbation du projet = 150 €Matériaux de construction (ballots de paille, bois, argile, clous ) + transport + main d’oeuvre = 450 €Bannière =  50 € Brochures = 200 €Cartes de visite = 50 €Promotion en ligne = 200 €Frais de campagne Indiegogo = 150 €Total 2150 €_______________________________[DE] Kostenaufwand:Teilnahmegebühr: 150 €Standmiete: 15m² X 50€ = 750 €Projektgenehmigunggebühr: 150 €Baustoffe (Strohballen, Holz, Lehm und Ton, Nägel) + Transport + Hilfsarbeiter = 450 €Banner = 50 €Broschüren = 200 €Geschäftskarten = 50 €Online-Werbung = 200 €Indiegogo Kampagne Gebühr = 150 €Toatal 2150 €_______________________________







[RO] Cheltuieli

Taxa participare Construct Expo: 150 €
Închiriere spațiu stand: 150 €












Taxa aprobare proiect stand: 15 m2 X 50 € = 750 €

Materiale de construcție (baloți de paie, lemn, lut, cuie) + transport + ajutoare =
450 € 
Bannere = 50 €

Fluturași = 200 €
Cărți de vizită = 50 €
Publicitate online = 200 €
Taxa de campanie Indiegogo = 150 € 
Total 2150 € 




Link to the Construct Expo website http://www.constructexpo.ro/despreEarth Safe Design http://www.earthsafedesign.com/Find us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/earthsafedesign

story:
Project Summary

Hello! Thank you for your interest in my project. My name is Ariel Kedem and I am the founder of the "Congo 2030" initiative, a unique and innovative initiative that aims to protect and promote both people and wildlife in the Democratic Republic of Congo through the empowerment of local, CONGOLESE conservationists and community leaders.

Imagine this: a country the size of all of western Europe, consisting the majority of the world's second largest rainforest, which is home to some of the most exotic and rare animals on the planet such as gorillas, chimpanzees, bonobos, okapi, forest elephants and others. Now add 20 years of the most brutal and bloody war since World War II, taking place right smack in the middle of this rainforest, bringing death to over 5 million people and bringing all of the above animals to the brink of extinction. This is, literally, a human and environmental catastrophe. The people in and around these forests live on less than $1 a day and unfortunately have only one resource to depend on - the rainforest. However, these forests cannot sustain them forever and the current human pressure on them is pushing them towards extinction.

Here's what we're trying to do to solve this nearly impossible situation:

a) Educate local communities about the importance of nature conservation.

b) Provide local communities with alternative streams of income (agricultural programs, craft-making, micro-enterprise development etc').

c) Develop sustainable eco-tourism that will provide income to the community and help increase conservation efforts.

d) Increase research about the threats facing the local wildlife and ways in which they can be dealt with.

e) Empower and connect young community and conservation leaders.

In a country in which most people live on less than $1 a day, every dollar you can give will go a long way towards ensuring a future for people and wildlife in Congo!

What We Need 

We're now working in a remote area of eastern DRC, still somewhat controlled by different rebel groups and armed forces. These people live right next to the Kahuzi Biega National Park, home to the largest population of Eastern Lowland Gorillas. Both humans and gorillas have been slaughtered in the thousands during the last two decades. We want to help them both. 

We believe that education is the key to all: Teaching people about nature conservation, providing children with a brighter socio-economic future, empowering whole communities and enabling people and gorillas to live in harmony. For this purpose we would like to build two new schools - one primary and one secondary - and we need your help!

This is how these children currently study:

The Impact

Your donation will provide hundreds of children, youth and their families with long-term education in a sheltered environment, enabling children to study at all hours of the day and even during the night. Every donation amount is extremely helpful and most appreciated! This is your chance to make a direct impact on the lives of some of the most disadvantaged people in the world who have been suffering for countless decades, and at the same time helping to protect highly endangered gorillas as well as their incredibly bio-diverse habitat.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Help our project get some publicity and press coverage.
  • Connect us to other organizations or funders who share the same interests.

Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Who are we

We are a group of Calgarians passionate about reducing food waste and delivering excess food to service agencies:

  • Team Unite: four high school students who have partnered with Leftovers Foundation to help design and develop the Leftovers App
  • The app will help streamline our current operations process of rerouting safe, unsold food and help us efficiently expand nationwide 
  • With your help, we can expand the amount of food we save and deliver to service agencies across Canada

Funding & Perks

Our app is currently in development, but we need additional funding to complete development, licensing and future updates to the app:

  • Perks: We're offering Leftovers merchandise and also ice cream for a year for donations... see our Perks!

Food Waste: A Global Problem

Why do we need an app to help us?

  • Our current open-source software to reroute is inefficient and isn't able to adjust deliveries in real time -- what if a vendor has a last minute donation of foods -- our current process would take at least a day to alert a volunteer
  • Expand and scale: with this app it will be much easier to expand the Leftovers brand and food rescue to other cities in Canada
  • In 2017, we were able to rescue almost 200,000lbs of food. With this app, we want to rescue even more

Challenges

Rerouting excess food has certain challenges:

  • Meeting State/Provincial health guidelines can be an obstacle, but with this App, we can track and monitor our performance to ensure these guidelines are met

Can't make a $$ donation at this time?

We rely on people-power to make our food rescues happen:

  • Sign up for a delivery route in Calgary to help rescue food today!
  • Volunteer at your local food bank
  • Try not to waste food at home :)

story:
Seegras der Dämmstoff aus der Ostsee neu entdeckt!

Ich möchte gerne Seegras aus der Ostsee als Dämmmaterial wieder bekannt machen und vertreiben. Seitdem wir unser Dach vor 8 Jahren selber mit Seegras gedämmt haben, bin ich von Seegras begeistert: Verwendung eines "Abfallproduktes", weder Ackerflächen noch chemische Nachbehandlung nötig, gute Dämmeigenschaften, resistent gegen Schimmel, Schädlinge und Feuer, unempfindlich gegen Feuchtigkeit, allergikerfreundlich, Jahrhunderte Erfahrung durch die Verwendung von Seegras als Polster- und Dämmmaterial, Verbindung zum Meer... Jedes Jahr werden tonnenweise Seegras an die Strände der Ostsee gespült, die dann aufwändig entsorgt werden müssen, hier eine sinnvolle Nutzung zu etablieren macht einfach Sinn. In Dänemark gibt es zwei Bauern, die Seegras nach unseren Vorstellungen sammeln und auf einfache Weise weiterverarbeiten, hier werden wir im ersten Schritt einen LKW mit Seegras anforden und das Dämmmaterial idealerweise direkt an Baustellen ausliefern.

Wir brauchen
Für die erste Lieferung Seegras aus Dänemark benötigen wir eine Vorfinanzierung von 8.000 Euro. Ihr könnt uns also hierbei helfen und Euch sogar einen Teil des Seegrases für Euer eigenes Bauprojekt sichern. Sollten wir es in dieser Kampagne nicht schaffen, diese Lieferung zu finanzieren und auch keine anderen Finanzmittel auftun, zahlen wir Euch die gezahlten Beträge zurück, Ihr geht also kein Risiko ein!

Was bekommst Du

Perks haben wir in drei Kategorien eingeteilt, Ihr könnt uns schon mit wenig Geld unterstützen (ab 10 Euro), dann werden wir Euch persönlich über die weitere Entwicklung des Seegrasprojektes informieren und Euch eine Probe per Post zukommen lassen. Wer mehr über Seegras und die Ostsee erfahren möchte, ist mit 40 Euro bei unserem Seegrasseminar und mit 100 Euro bei unserem Ostsee-Erlebnis Wochenende dabei.
Als dritte Gruppe möchten wir speziell Bauherren und -frauen ansprechen, sie können je nach Budget von der Beratung zu richtiger Seegrasdämmung über Gutscheine für den Erwerb von Seegras bis zur Mithilfe beim Einbringen des Seegrases dabei sein. 

Warum ist Seegras extrem ökologisch?

Der heutige Markt an ökologischen Produkten ist schon sehr toll, Hanf, Flachs und dergleichen sind sehr gute Produkte. Aber an Ökologie ist Seegras kaum zu toppen, da es nicht extra angebaut (keine Ackerflächen) und behandelt werden muss, im Gegenteil, es werden viel Kosten und Mühe aufgebracht, um es zu entfernen, weil es die Touristen an den Stränden stört. Auch muss es nicht weiter aufbereitet werden, es muss nur trocknen und kann dann direkt in Hohlräume eingebracht werden.

Der Mensch liebt das Gefühl, aus der Fülle schöpfen zu können. Aber wo kann man das schon heutzutage, ohne dabei andere Menschen oder die Natur auszubeuten? Bei Seegras kann man es. Es steht in Massen zur Verfügung und wächst jedes Jahr nach. Bei dem heutigen hohen Nährstoffeintrag in die Meere ist es vielleicht sogar eine kleine Erleichterung für die Ostsee, wenn man ihr möglichst viel davon abnimmt.

Wie wird es geerntet?

Lange Zeit hat man es an Stränden aufgesammelt, entweder per Hand oder mit Traktoren/Baggern. So war aber viel Sand und zum Teil auch Müll darin enthalten. Mit der Technik, die zwei dänische Landwirte entwickelt haben, wird viel Aufwand gespart und 1 A Qualität gewonnen: sie fischen das angetriebene Seegras direkt aus dem Wasser und lassen es den Sommer über auf Wiesen liegen. Der weitere Verarbeitungsprozess entspricht genau dem von Heu, also werden keine weiteren Maschinen als die üblichen landwirtschaftlichen benötigt.

Du kannst auch auf andere Weisen helfen...

Auch wer keine finanzielle Unterstützung leisten kann, kann uns natürlich bei der Verbreitung von Seegras als Dämmmaterial helfen, gerne informieren wir Euch über die weitere Entwicklung unseres Projektes:
- sendet unsere Kampagne an Freunde und Bekannte, berichtet über uns
- sprecht Bauherren- und -frauen oder Architekten an
- vermittelt uns Kontakte zu ökologischen Bauprojekten
- verteilt unser Werbematerial (schicken wir Euch auf Anfrage zu)
 
hier gibts die Infos schön als PDF zum ausdrucken und verteilen:
http://d2oadd98wnjs7n.cloudfront.net/medias/446...

Seegras Seminar

Da für einige das erste Seminar zu kruzfristig war, bieten wir eine weitere Möglichkeit Seegras live zu erleben: am 6.10.2012 von 10-16 Uhr in Lütau bei Lauenburg. Dabei wollen wir als Demonstation einen Teil eines Daches von einem alten Bauernhaus mit Seegras dämmen. Das Seminar wird sehr praktisch orientiert sein und nur kurze theoretische Teile enthalten, vor allem gehen wir auf die konkreten Fragen der TeilnehmerInnen ein. Themen sind unter anderem: Die Vorzüge von Seegras, Zusammenspiel mit anderen ökologischen Baustoffen wie z.B. Lehm, Feuerschutz mit Seegras und die Herstellung/Ernte von Seegras. Unsere Zielgruppe sind vor allen Bauherren und -frauen, Denkmalschützer, Althaussanierer sowie Architekten. Kosten: auf Spendenbasis. Veranstalter: Lauenburgische Lehmwerkstatt. Bei Interesse bitte melden: info@seegrashandel.de
(ein Flayer ist in der Galerie)

Wenn Ihr weitere Ideen habt, meldet Euch!

Der Mensch liebt das Gefühl, aus der Fülle schöpfen zu können. Aber wo kann man das schon heutzutage, ohne dabei andere Menschen oder die Natur auszubeuten? Bei Seegras kann man es. Es steht in Massen zur Verfügung und wächst jedes Jahr nach. Bei dem heutigen hohen Nährstoffeintrag in die Meere ist es vielleicht sogar eine kleine Erleichterung für die Ostsee, wenn man ihr möglichst viel davon abnimmt.
Wie wird es geerntet?
Lange Zeit hat man es an Stränden aufgesammelt, entweder per Hand oder mit Traktoren/Baggern. So war aber viel Sand und zum Teil auch Müll darin enthalten. Mit der Technik, die zwei dänische Landwirte entwickelt haben, wird viel Aufwand gespart und 1 A Qualität gewonnen: sie fischen das angetriebene Seegras direkt aus dem Wasser und lassen es den Sommer über auf Wiesen liegen. Der weitere Verarbeitungsprozess entspricht genau dem von Heu, also werden keine weiteren Maschinen als die üblichen landwirtschaftlichen benötigt.


Du kannst auch auf andere Weisen helfen...
Auch wer keine finanzielle Unterstützung leisten kann, kann uns natürlich bei der Verbreitung von Seegras als Dämmmaterial helfen, gerne informieren wir Euch über die weitere Entwicklung unseres Projektes: - sendet unsere Kampagne an Freunde und Bekannte, berichtet über uns - sprecht Bauherren- und -frauen oder Architekten an - vermittelt uns Kontakte zu ökologischen Bauprojekten - verteilt unser Werbematerial (schicken wir Euch auf Anfrage zu)
 
hier gibts die Infos schön als PDF zum ausdrucken und verteilen:
http://d2oadd98wnjs7n.cloudfront.net/medias/446...
Seegras Seminar
Da für einige das erste Seminar zu kruzfristig war, bieten wir eine weitere Möglichkeit Seegras live zu erleben: am 6.10.2012 von 10-16 Uhr in Lütau bei Lauenburg. Dabei wollen wir als Demonstation einen Teil eines Daches von einem alten Bauernhaus mit Seegras dämmen. Das Seminar wird sehr praktisch orientiert sein und nur kurze theoretische Teile enthalten, vor allem gehen wir auf die konkreten Fragen der TeilnehmerInnen ein. Themen sind unter anderem: Die Vorzüge von Seegras, Zusammenspiel mit anderen ökologischen Baustoffen wie z.B. Lehm, Feuerschutz mit Seegras und die Herstellung/Ernte von Seegras. Unsere Zielgruppe sind vor allen Bauherren und -frauen, Denkmalschützer, Althaussanierer sowie Architekten. Kosten: auf Spendenbasis. Veranstalter: Lauenburgische Lehmwerkstatt. Bei Interesse bitte melden: info@seegrashandel.de
(ein Flayer ist in der Galerie) Wenn Ihr weitere Ideen habt, meldet Euch!

story:
Summary

Compressed air as a 'fuel' for vehicles has been the subject of both theory and practical use since the late 1800's. But taking the technology from operating a locomotive in an underground mine to powering a light weight utility vehicle, and ultimately a passenger car, requires materials and electronics that have only come into existence in the past few years. It also takes 'rocket science' engineering talent, and as the long time home of a national laboratory and many related high tech companies, Albuquerque, New Mexico, has supplied that talent.

Thanks to the commitment and passion of the individuals who have brought us this far, well over $500,000 has gone toward the refinement of our first (two cylinder) motor model during the past two years. Based on the output of this motor, our calculations indicate that four and six cylinder versions will be quite adequate for full size vehicles; furthermore, we anticipate that sales of our low speed utility vehicles will go a long way toward covering development costs of the larger motors, and certainly provide the test data needed in their design.

 

The next challenge has been compressed air containment, and we have located a manufacturer who can build the high pressure tanks that we need, and do it quickly enough to keep up with assembly schedules.

Our engineering efforts are now concentrating on electro-mechanical control systems. Turning 5,000 psi into torque and horsepower that matches the application, provides sufficient operational time between charges, etc. is a matter of testing and fine tuning, both on the bench and on the track.

Our first two prototypes are in the final stages of completion and we will be producing a documentary video of their demonstration during the course of this campaign. We have selected a property for office and testing facilities, and very shortly will be moving in and putting the first two prototypes through rigorous testing for feedback prior to building the next 28 demonstration units.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This campaign, with a target of $180,000, along with other investment commitments we have in place, will provide funding for operations for the balance of 2013 and enable us to produce the more extensive documentation that is required to get the attention of Federal, foundation, and private grant sources. More importantly, it will expose our project to thousands of people, many of whom will be potential customers as well as potential investors at higher levels.

 

Perks:

We simply want everyone who breathes to be a part of this project. So our minimum participation level is only $19. This will get you 'in' and you will be getting our newsletter with the latest good news as we move forward in creating not only a new company, but a new industry. Quite frankly, we hope that many of our subscribers ultimately decide that they can do it even BETTER than we do, and start their own company and join our community of compressed air powered innovation. As you can see on our Campaign page, we have some nice perks at higher levels, including caps, golf shirts, rounds of golf in one of our prototype carts, and more!

The Impact

The planet is addicted to personal transportation, despite the best efforts of municipalities and regions to expand mass transit. Personal transportation represents freedom. But it also represents responsibility. While the impact of replacing gas and battery powered carts currently in use for recreation and commercial duties may seem small, the impact of proving the concept in a real working environment is beyond measure. Our business plan includes expanding into ATV's and LSV's and ultimately to cars and light trucks. The environment simply can not survive a combination of worldwide economic development (which means more and more people will be able to afford personal transportation) with petroleum as a power source for a billion more vehicles.

Other Ways You Can Help

Use the 'share' tools on Indiegogo to spread the word to your social network! If you know a potential investor, have them contact us. If you have contacts in the arena of foundations, grants, etc., please share our project with them. But most of all, visualize a dramatic transformation of personal transportation in your lifetime that will truly change the world.

story:
Artists Against Ivory

When you support Artists Against Ivory you feed and care for orphaned baby elephants. And get great rewards too, like these fashion items below (see further down for more detail).



Why

Currently 36,000 elephants are killed every year for their ivory. At this rate we expect that elephants have only 10 years left to enjoy their natural home. 

And there is an even darker side: the ivory trade has been linked to the funding of terror groups and organised crime. 


What We Need & What You Get


An orphaned baby elephant needs

  • Special formula food
  • Veterinary care
  • Love, protection and suntan lotion

You sponsor the above  when you donate to our campaign or purchase one of our fashion items.

Your 15 main rewards to choose from are featured below (the full list is featured below that)


$2 and you get a digital certificate by email to thank you for your contribution. And you feed an orphaned elephant with nutritious meals. 


$5 and you get the digital certificate and we send you a thank you card from the elephants. Art on a Card by Alice Popkorn - dialogue at the water hole. See design below. And you feed an orphaned elephant with nutritious meals.


$10 and you get the digital certificate the card AND we send Art on a Card to Angela Merkel (Chancellor of Germany) and to Peng Liyuan (wife of China's current leader Xi Jinping) asking them to help save the elephants. And you feed an orphaned elephant with nutritious meals.


$15 and you get - all the above and 5 Artists Against Ivory wristbands. And you feed an orphaned elephant with nutritious meals.



$20 and you get - all the above plus an extra 5 Artists Against Ivory wristbands (so 10 wristbands altogether).  And you feed an orphaned elephant with nutritious meals.


$30 and you get - all in the $20 package and a pack of 5 Artists Against Ivory Art on a Card, Art by Alice Popkorn - dialogue at the water hole. And you feed an orphaned elephant with nutritious meals and help pay for their sun protection.


$41 and you get Putin's Strong T. And you feed an orphaned elephant with nutritious meals and help pay for their sun protection.


Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL. Your size specification will be collected after the campaign so no need to worry for now about size. 

$50 and you get Obama's Green T sent to you with a thank you card. And you feed an orphaned elephant with nutritious meals and help pay for their sun protection.


Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL. Your size specification will be collected after the campaign so no need to worry for now about size. 


$61 and you get Xi's T with a thank you card. And you feed an orphaned elephant with nutritious meals and help pay for their sun protection.

Xi's T - a premium quality, 9 colour print, Artists Against Ivory T-shirt featuring sublime and intricate art by Paul Robbins. 

$76 and you get Oprah's Spaghet-T  and a thank you card. And you feed an orphaned elephant with nutritious meals and help pay for their sun protection.

Oprah's Spaghet-T - a premium quality 9 colour spaghetti T-top featuring sublime and intricate art by Paul Robbins.

Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL. Your size specification will be collected after the campaign so no need to worry for now about size. 


$146 and you get the Queen's T and you get a thank you card. Plus you feed an orphaned baby elephant with 80 nutritious meals,  help pay for their sun protection. and contribute towards their rehabilitation. 

The Queen's T - a premium sublimation print Artists Against Ivory T-shirt featuring 'Little Stompers' Art by wildlife artist of the year 2014 nominee, Karen Laurence-Rowe.

Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL. Your size specification will be collected after the campaign so no need to worry for now about size. 

$249 and you get the beautiful solid sterling silver bangle 'A good outlook on life'. Gloss polished to reveal classic beauty and slight texture. Design by Miss Elle Anyoux. Plus you feed an orphaned baby elephant with one month's nutritious meals, help pay for their sun protection. and contribute towards their rehabilitation. 

Size: Inside diameter is 65 mm, 60mm, 55mm or 50mm. Across the ears measures 14mm. Your size specification will be collected after the campaign so no need to worry about size for now.  


$299 and you get a beautiful solid sterling silver bangle titled 'Forever love'.  Sterling silver polished to reveal classic beauty and slight texture. Design by Miss Elle Anyoux. And you feed an orphaned baby elephant with one month's nutritious meals, help pay for their sun protection. and contribute towards their rehabilitation. 

Size: Inside diameter is 65 mm, 60mm, 55mm or 50mm. Across the ears measures 14mm. Your size specification will be collected after the campaign so no need to worry about size for now. 


$369 and you get the 'The Spirit Tusk', 22k gold plated solid brass tusk pendant with Chinese characters for Artists Against Ivory. The Spirit Tusk pendant represents the beautiful soul of the world's warmest animal. Design by Miss Elle Anyoux. And you feed an orphaned baby elephant with one month's nutritious meals, help pay for their sun protection. and contribute towards their rehabilitation.  and veterinary care. 






Pendant can be worn vertical or horizontal. Chain / leather not included.

Dimensions approximately 5cm long x 1.6cm at wide end and 0.8cm at narrow end. 

Below the pendant is chained for horizontal wear. Chain / leather not included.



$999 and you get Kiongozi. Kiongozi  is the Swahili word for leader (one having authority) and leadership is represented in this stunning solid sterling silver bangle designed by Fiona Scourfield. The bangle is solid, weighty and conveys a definite sense of power. Yvori brand on the inside of the bangle. And you feed an orphaned baby elephant with one month's nutritious meals, help pay for their sun protection. and contribute towards their rehabilitation. and veterinary care. 



Size: Inside diameter is 60mm, 55mm or 50mm. Width 23mm, wall thickness 2.8mm. Polished to a beautiful gloss while the elephants have an intricate weave pattern that mimics the natural grain of their skin. Available in larger diameters by request.


The extended reward list is featured below:


Orphaned baby elephants need 

  • Love and attention. Each donation helps fund a carer. 


  • Special formula milk every 3 hours, day and night! Each donation helps fund a nutritious meal.

  • Sun protection (Normally the mother would be a natural umbrella). 

  • Rehabilitation (Lessons for returning to the great outdoors).


Our profits are donated to:  

1. The David Shepherd Wildlife Foundation (www.davidshepherd.org)

2. Save the Elephants (www.savetheelephants.org)

3. PAMS Foundation (www.pamsfoundation.org)

4. WildAid (www.wildaid.org)

5. Space for Giants (www.spaceforgiants.org)

And other organisations on the forefront of conservation.

What do you get?

  • Every donation / purchase you make feeds a at least one nutritious meal to an orphaned baby elephant. 
  • And you can wear fashion designed by artists for Artists Against Ivory. Wear the brand that makes a statement.
  • And you can choose a world leader or someone you admire and send them a card or T-shirt or jewellery that makes a statement against the ivory trade. 



Extra rewards!

Choose one of theses rewards and we will send the gift to a world leader, someone who can influence the future of elephants. If you are inspired to send to someone other than those we have listed below please contact us with your payment details and we will gladly send as you request.   


$40 and you get Putin's Strong T (shirt art below) sent to Vladimir Putin with a card in your name asking him to help save our elephants. Plus you feed an orphaned baby elephant with 8 nutritious meals,  provide them with a warm hug and a dab of suntan cream.



 Putin's Strong T - an Artists Against Ivory premium quality T-shirt. 

We know Vlad's size and address so no need to fill that in.


$49 and you get Obama's Green T sent with a card in your name to Barack Obama asking him to help save our elephants,  Plus you feed an orphaned baby elephant with 8 nutritious meals,  provide them with a warm hug and a dab of suntan cream.


Obama's Green T - a Gareth Lloyd creation. 

We'll drop this T in on AirForce One - Obama's big caravan in the sky so no need to provide his address.

$60 and you get Xi's T sent with a card in your name to China's current leader Xi Jinping asking him to help save our elephants. Plus you feed an orphaned baby elephant with 16 nutritious meals,  provide them with a warm hug and a dab of suntan cream.

Xi's T - a premium quality, 9 colour print, Artists Against Ivory T-shirt featuring sublime and intricate art by Paul Robbins. 

We'll address this beauty to Xi behind the Wall.


$70 and you get Oprah's Spaghet-T sent with a card in your name to Oprah Winfrey asking her to help save our elephants. Plus you feed an orphaned baby elephant with 16 nutritious meals, provide them with a warm hug and a dab of suntan cream.      


Oprah's Spaghet-T - a premium quality 9 colour spaghetti T-top featuring sublime and intricate art by Paul Robbins.

We're sending this to Hollywood - the PostPerson Pat knows where from there!!


$140 and you get the Queen's T sent with a card in your name to the Queen asking her to help save the elephants. Plus you feed an orphaned baby elephant with 80 nutritious meals and contribute to their sun protection and help pay for their rehabilitation. 



The Queen's T a premium sublimation print Artists Against Ivory T-shirt featuring 'Little Stompers' Art by wildlife artist of the year 2012, Karen Laurence-Rowe. Print as above but unisex T-shirt may vary. 



The Impact

Your contribution will help reduce the demand for ivory so that your children can inherit and cherish one of the world’s most magnificent mammals in its rightful habitat. You also make life a little more bearable for the orphans of the ivory trade. Wear your Yvori brand with pride and send a message to the world that Ivory is not Art, it is Life. Funds go to some of the biggest names in Elephant conservation.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute but think the baby elephants are a worthy cause please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Post on your Facebook page, blog about it, tweet and shout. Nudge your journalist friends into action. Send us some art ideas for our next campaign!

Like our Facebook page: www.facebook.com/artistsagainstivory

Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so much,

Artists Against Ivory

story:
Summary  

     In September 2014 a group of students, teachers and parents at Northcoast Preparatory and Performing Arts Academy, in Arcata, California, launched the school’s Climate Change Project. We are a student-led group but we have had much help from our wonderfully committed adult supervisors, Keta Paulson Palmer, Larry Soll and Greg King. While the NPA Climate Change Project is principally committed to working locally, in Humboldt County, to address the global threat of climate change, our greatest funding need is our planned journey to Paris this year for the 21st United Nations Climate Change Conference. At least ten NPA students and three adult chaperones will attend the conference from Nov. 30 – Dec. 11. There we will collaborate with youth from throughout the world to make our voices heard in favor of sensible, rapid action to forestall the looming catastrophe of climate change. In Paris we will collaborate with Concordia, a French non-profit organization that will host youth groups from 30 countries to attend events and share performances during the Climate Conference. The Concordia collaboration will allow our efforts to extend further than just our own community, and at the same time we will learn from other organizations what we can do to further create change. But we need your help to do it!

What We Need & What You Get

     The bulk, though not all the funding raised in this campaign will pay for travel costs associated with the UN Climate Conference. Some funds will also go to future events and generally contribute to our mission of working locally to educate residents, and ouselves, about climate change and what we can do about it. Attending the conference is just another part of our mission. If you choose to contribute you will be given a perk! See below for the perks associated with contribution levels.

The Impact

     The NPA Climate Change Project has already had an impact locally. In February 2015 the Eureka Times-Standard ran a front-page story on our art installation and performance event during Arts Arcata. That story is here: http://www.times-standard.com/general-news/20150215/students-raising-climate-consciousness-funds-for-paris-trip. By continuing to work locally for a global cause we are able to engage and inform local residents and, we hope, garner even greater community input to meet the challenges of Climate Change. Our journey to Paris will inevitably put us in contact with groups and individuals from around the world who are making similar efforts. Together we can shape climate policies locally, nationally and globally. The time is now. There is momentum on a world scale. We, the people, can and must develop and demand quick and effective action to forestall climate change.

Risks & Challenges

     One of the challenges that has been pointed out to us is that by flying to Paris we will be contributing to carbon emissions. We recognize this, and understand the argument. But what better cause to fly for? Would it be better for us to sit at home, or to go out into the world and create change? Nevertheless, we don't want to completely disregard this concern so we will purchase carbon credits from the City of Arcata. These carbon credits will support the city’s efforts to protect the Arcata Community Forest, and to purchase more forestland in the future. It is an excellent means for us to balance some of the carbon we are putting into the air. While this doesn't completely solve the problem, it helps.

Other Ways You Can Help

      We understand that some people cannot contribute at this time, and that’s okay! Tell your friends about our campaign, use the Indiegogo share tools to help us get our campaign out there. Thank you for your support! And thank you also for becoming educated on the issues our world is facing related to climate change and its effects.
